const ProductPage = () => { const [selectedProduct, setSelectedProduct] = useState(null); const products = [ { id: 1, code: "P001", name: "Product 1", stock: 100, reserve: 20, remaining: 80 }, { id: 2, code: "P002", name: "Product 2", stock: 150, reserve: 50, remaining: 100 }, { id: 3, code: "P003", name: "Product 3", stock: 200, reserve: 100, remaining: 100 }, { id: 4, code: "P004", name: "Product 4", stock: 300, reserve: 150, remaining: 150 }, ]; const handleProductClick = (product) => { setSelectedProduct(product); }; return (
